The code is binary -> cyberchef

Running magic on it: Suggests from binary-> from octal

Output: AERNWTS{5AMC50WM_F0E_D1F3}

Clue 1: Looking at the question close vinegar points to vignère cipher

Clue 2: City she lives in. Using the phone number San Juan, Puerto Rico

So applying vignère decode with key as sanjuanpuertorico

Flag: IEEECTF{5LSY50FT_R0N_V1D3}
